data.meanings: to regret as repentance and penitence as a result of a sinful act.
data.sentence: The word نَادِمِينَ comes from the root ن د م and is associated with the meanings: to regret as repentance and penitence as a result of a sinful act.

data.meanings: to visit or greet in the morning. subhun/sabahun/isbaahun - the morning. misbaahun (pl. masaabih) - lamp. sabbah (vb. 2) - to come to, come upon, greet, drink in the morning. asbaha - to enter upon the time of the morning, appear, begin to do, to be, become, happen. musbih - one who does anything in or enters upon the morning.
data.sentence: The word فَأَصْبَحُوا comes from the root ص ب ح and is associated with the meanings: to visit or greet in the morning. subhun/sabahun/isbaahun - the morning. misbaahun (pl. masaabih) - lamp. sabbah (vb. 2) - to come to, come upon, greet, drink in the morning. asbaha - to enter upon the time of the morning, appear, begin to do, to be, become, happen. musbih - one who does anything in or enters upon the morning.

data.meanings: to cut/wound/slay, hamstrung, produce no result, be barren (e.g. womb).
data.sentence: The word فَعَقَرُوهَا comes from the root ع ق ر and is associated with the meanings: to cut/wound/slay, hamstrung, produce no result, be barren (e.g. womb).
